title: Input Validation and Echo
description: Write a program that takes a user's name and age as input and then validates the age. If the age is less than 18, print 'You are a minor.' If the age is 18 or above, print 'You are an adult.' Then, echo back the user's name and age. Ensure that the age is a positive integer.
sample_output:
You are an adult.
Name: John
Age: 25
